name: Quinimon
description:
Quinimon is a single-player (for now) parody rpg.

Somebody  made a cloning device and things got out of hand. She build it to clone herself but now the world is overrun by Michelle sized quinimon! Snatch 'm, snatch 'm all! Well not all exactly that is going to take a while... 19 queens so far (I'm starting with all the winners)

Made with love and in good fun, no shade intended.

I'll make it multiplayer if it will get enough players or the lobby would just be empty all the time.
